description:
Mpox is a global emergency, but it’s not another Covid. Though it can be deadly, it spreads differently and isn’t airborne. Prevention and containment are key to stopping its spread – let’s act now.

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science #mpoxvirus #publichealth
